Method Detail

getRelativeDirection

public MonomerDirection getRelativeDirection()
The direction of the vector from the previous monomer to this one. A direction must be legal. That is it cannot be UP or DOWN in a 2D world. Any change in the value of this field requires recalculation of all the vectors. Both restrictions are enforced by restricting access to this field to the set command the explicitly test that the direction is legal and recalculate the vectors.

setRelativeDirection

public boolean setRelativeDirection(MonomerDirection relativeDirection)

reset

public void reset()

isClashBack

public boolean isClashBack()
Finds whether this monomer overlaps with one of its predecessors.

Returns:
true if overlap ocures
